text: Stars and bars may refer to: * Stars and Bars (flag), the first (1861–1863) flag of the Confederate States of America * Stars and Bars (1988 film), 1988 comedy starring Daniel Day-Lewis * Stars and Bars (1917 film), 1917 silent film comedy directed by Victor Heerman * Stars and bars (combinatorics), a graphical method used to derive the formula for multiset coefficients and other combinatorial theorems * Stars and Bars (novel), a 1984 novel by William Boyd * A song by Scottish group Goodbye Mr. Mackenzie ==See also== *Stars and stripes (disambiguation) *Stars (disambiguation) *Stripes (disambiguation)
title: Stars and bars
